text: Ángel Pérez García (16 October 1957 – 17 October 2019) was a Spanish footballer. He was born in Madrid. He played as a defender, and was a manager. García played for Real Madrid from 1980 through 1982. From 1985 through 1991, he played for Real Murcia. García died on 17 October 2019 in Madrid of cancer, a day after his 62nd birthday.Pérez García passes away ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1957 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Spanish football managers Category:Cancer deaths in Spain Category:Sportspeople from Madrid Category:Footballers from Madrid
title: Ángel Pérez García
